entities.description: Numeric values indicating frequency counts without weighting applied.
The number of valid cases out of total cases.
The data points that are missing or not reported in the dataset.
Summary statistics including mean, median, mode, minimum, maximum, and standard deviation.
The range of missing values represented by specific numeric codes.
The type of variable, in this case, numeric.
The location information indicating width and decimal precision of the variable.
Numeric identifier for offenders, with specific values indicating unknown offenders or missing data.

relationships.description: Indicates the unweighted frequency for the survey result.
Indicates the number of valid cases from the survey result.
Indicates the count of missing data from the survey result.
Summarizes the statistical data for valid cases in the survey.
Indicates the range of valid and missing values for a variable.
Specifies the type of the variable, such as numeric.
Specifies the location details, such as width and decimal precision, for the variable.
Provides the offender number with specific values indicating unknown or missing data.
